I'm Rick Harrison, and this is my pawn shop. I work here with my old man and my son, Big Hoss. Everything in here has a story and a price. One thing I've learned after 21 years - you never know what is gonna come through that door.

This has to be the best co-op game I've played so far, the graphics still look nice and gameplay is really fun. Even though the game is 8 years old now it still has players in multiplayer. This is a must-buy for anyone who wants to play a great co-op game, which is even better when played with friends.

This game its great

Left 4 Dead. The real motherfucker when it comes to zombie shooters. This was a fantastic game at the time, but since the release of Left 4 Dead 2, there is not much reason to buy this game. All content that was featured in L4D1 is implemented in L4D2. However, L4D1 does feature a slightly *darker* atmosphere and horror. When you look down you actually see your feet, and admittedly the L4D1 survivors featured in L4D2 have slightly buggy animations. All in all, if you want the authentic Left 4 Dead 1 experience, I will recommend this game. Before the release of L4D2, I would highly recommend this game. There's not much reason to get this game.
gg
This game is exciting and overall pretty great.

[b]Adını oyun dünyasına altın harflerle yazdırmış olan [url=https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Turtle%20Rock%20Studios]Turtle Rock Studios[/url]'un yıldızının parladığı oyundur kendisi. Hikâyemiz, bilindiği kadarıyla Pennsylvania'da ortaya çıkan ve tüm dünyaya yayılan Green Flu hastalığının geri dönülemez olduğu noktalarda geçiyor. Şehirlerin hastalığı taşımayan insanlar tarafından arındırıldığı, tüm her yerin karantinaya alındığı bir dünyada sağ kalan dört insan olan Zoey, Francis, Louis ve Bill ile hayatta kalıp tahliye olmaya çalışıyoruz. Oyun içerisinde oynayabileceğiniz toplam yedi adet senaryo bulunuyor ve hepsine tek bir amacımız var, kaçmak. Diğer noktalara göz atarsak da yapım çeşitlilik bakımından oldukça zengin zira gerek silahlar olsun gerek zombilerin varyasyonları olsun fazlasıyla tatmin edici düzeyde. Oyunda eksikliğini hissettiğim en büyük nokta, yakın mesafe silahlarının az hatta tek bir silah üzerine olması. Tabanca dışında [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/550/Left_4_Dead_2/]Left 4 Dead 2[/url]'deki gibi sopa ve benzeri yakın mesafe silahları bulunmuyor. Bunun dışında yapım, çıkış yaptığı yıla göre fazlasıyla başarılı grafiklere ve tatmin edici efektlere sahip. Oynarken sanki on dört senelik bir oyunu oynuyormuşsunuz hissetmiyorsunuz. Sesler ve müzikler bakımından da son derece başarılı olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Özellikle oyunun ana menü müziğine gerçekten bayılıyorum çünkü çaresizliği iliklerime kadar hissettiren bu kadar etkileyici çok az oyun müziği duydum. Çaresizlik demişken sadece müzik bakımından değil, oyun interaktif olarak da size bunu yaşatmaya çalışıyor. Kurtuluş için mücadele verirken etrafta hayatta kalmaya çalışırken ölen insanları ve geçmişteki yaşananları görmek etkileyici olabiliyor. Velhasıl, tek başınıza veyahut arkadaşlarınızla beraber zombilerin arasında hayatta kalıp kurtuluşa ilerlemek istiyorsanız kütüphanenize eklemenizi ve denemenizi mutlaka tavsiye ederim.

12.10.2021 tarihli güncelleme notu: Geliştirici ve yapımcı stüdyo [url=https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Turtle%20Rock%20Studios]Turtle Rock Studios[/url]'un ellerinden çıkan yeni oyunumuz [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/924970/Back_4_Blood/]Back 4 Blood[/url], bizleri dört kişilik zombi mücadelesi macerasına yıllar sonra en yaratıcı şekilde geri getiriyor. Eğer ilginizi çekiyorsa [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/charewofficial/recommended/924970?snr=1_5_9__402]inceleme yazıma[/url] bi' göz atmanızı mutlaka öneririm, iyi oyunlar!

Daha fazla inceleme için;
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28040015[/b]

Incluindo uma oficina coisa que neste jogo não tem, mas o jogo é demais.(continuando antes de eu colocar o L4D2 na analise) O jogo tem boa jogabilidade(10/10), bons graficos para aquela epoca(9/10), e o mais importante...... não encontrei nenhum bug até agora.

Left 4 Dead is a fun cooperative experience that suffers from the Source engine's warts.  Some of the special monsters can make the game incredibly frustrating for somebody playing with a poorly-coordinated team and the map options that come with the game can get incredibly old quickly.  The fundamental dynamics of the game, however, are strong and can offer you several fantastic hours of horrified screaming as zombies tear your body apart.

[h1]Left 4 Dead[/h1]
Моё знакомство с L4D произошло немного позже, чем хотелось бы. Ну как немного... Лет на 8 позже. В то время, противостояние с зараженными, успешно заменяли ZM-сервера, в Counter-Strike 1.6 - кстати, большинство из них, использовали модели зомби из той самой Left 4 Dead, вперемешку с Half-Life.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=729882013
Концепция игры вполне себе оригинальная. Системные требования подходят даже для самых древних пыле-сборников начала двухтысячных, в отличии от 2й части игры, в которой, на старых компьютерах, возможно проседание fps.
Сюжетная часть проходится с интересом, правда стоит еще разобраться в чем именно заключается интерес. По сути, главная задача каждого эпизода - добраться до точки эвакуации, но то, как вы до нее будете добираться - это уже другая история. Геймплей - вот, что в этой игре по-настоящему затягивает. А возможность играть с друзьями - двойное удовольствие. Думаю, если бы я застал эту игру в свое время, я бы успел наиграть в нее не одну сотню часов. Что же касается нынешнего времени - игра, с каждым днем, все больше и больше устаревает. Действительно, зачем играть в L4D, если есть L4D2? - разве что для ознакомления с сюжетной линией.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=729882130
Сюжетка проходится за 5-7 часов. У меня, на первое прохождение, ушло 6 часов. После, я перепроходил некоторые эпизоды, для получения тех или иных ачивок. На получение всех достижений, скорее всего, уйдет часов 100-150.
Помимо сюжетной части, есть пара других режимов, в которых, так же, можно убить не один час.
Подводя итоги, можно сказать, что со своими основными задачами - игра справилась. Атмосфера, геймплей, картинка, озвучка - все выглядит вполне себе сносно. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=729882051
[h1]Отдельно игру советую покупать лишь тем, кто горит желанием узнать с чего же все начиналось, либо же у кого железо доисторических времен. Остальным же, рекомендую брать эту игру в скидочное время, в комплекте с L4D2.[/h1]

El juego lo recomiendo bastante. Porqué?, bueno, en primera hay que admitir que es un clásico, en segundo, es un juego en el que entre mas tiempo lo juegues mas te envicia y por ultimo y no menos importante, la jugabilidad y los gráficos van de maravilla...

Cosas malas: La verdad la primera vez que lo jugue ya hace varios años nunca creí que el juego fuera a pasar de moda, pero la única y triste verdad es que el juego esta muriendo, no porque aburra sino porque cada año que pasa, la gente lo va olvidando poco a poco y a consecuencia de eso ya casi no hay servers en los cuales jugar...

Gracias por leer.

Left 4 Dead - один из величайших шутеров про зомби. Очень важной частью игрового процесса является взаимодействие между игроками. Да, в одиночку против орды вам не выстоять. Сюжет, довольно прост, впрочем это вам не дрэгон эйдж. Во вступительном ролике четко дают понять - главное здесь мясо. Порадовали также и мультиплеерные режимы, один из самых ярких - Сражение. Команда выживших проходить стандартные кампании, но при этом их самыми опасными противниками - особыми зараженными, управляет не искуственный интеллект, а живые люди. Графика сносная для того времени. Управление... Классический шутер, разве что прицел только на некоторых видах оружия и есть удар прикладом.
Впрочем карты просто изобилуют всякими багами, которые портят настроение от игры. Именно поэтому прошу присмотреться ко второй части, где большая часть багов пофикшена, а так же появились новые карты (старые остались).


Графика: 7/10
Сюжет: 5/10
Звук: 8/10
Геймплей: 6/10
Управление: 9/10

El juego lo eh jugado muchisimo desde otra cuenta y ahora lo tengo en esta y la verdad seguire jugandolo siempre, aunque tengas todos los logros y mil horas de juego, cuando estes aburrido siempre es bueno descargarse contra estos zombies, la modalidad, efectos, graficos, animaciones, sonido, jugabilidad y originalidad estan a un nivel en el cual siempre que lo juegues planeas hacer otra partida, aunque en "imposible" repitas la misma partida 30 veces... seguis juggando, y en mi opinion su secuela mejoro algunos detalles pequeños pero en otros me quedo con el 1 (para no decir que el 2 es peor... jueguenlo tambien y opinen), en general un juego epico super recomendado, mucho mas jugar con amigos en grupo!

This is awesome game. But do not buy it. Left4Dead2 is better with more options, just buy 2 instead of this. I should have known this long time ago. After you buy the game you can watch the intro which shows you every aspect of the fights thus meaning there are few various enemies which maneuver between your shots, taunting enemies which need to be killed by your allies and bosses. So you are very dependent on your team as it is impossible to pass through some missions but you can still play with bots. Team is of 4 players. You have choice to be random but meaning no difference in play style.
You have choice to play classic campain mission, survival and the other is counting points against enemies.
At the beginning you start at spawn with few weapons to choose from, two types of grenades, big med-kit, pills (small).
The game is not offering big variation in play style as there is only one scoped gun, shotguns, machine guns and pistols with grenades. But there are stable machine guns, gasolines, gas tubes which you can use alternatively for crowds of them.
Game is pretty challenging but easy to control, you just need to think wisely when advancing, sticking with your allies and supporting all the time. Active gameplay towards missions. Good thing is you can retry the map with the same bunch after your crew is wiped and if you are personally killed somewhere near the beginning (except survival), you can be rescued soon. After retry some of the useable items are not available on the previous spots so use everything carefully and do not waste if you are near the failure of your mission, better try again. Whole mission takes you about 30-60 minutes. The wawes are similar to Killing Floor after you enter new area or trigger mission object the enemies run towards you in large numbers but always from different direction and taunting attacks make it even more unpredictable as you are never safe, especially when the tank (boss) comes in. Tank is easy to kill with 3 other allies but when alone you just have to run and he also has his friends. And there is at least one mission where are 3 tanks at once meaning that each player has to kill one by himself and the forth is probably not alive anymore.

I go the bundle game on sale, so I really can't complain. However, the price should be lowered. 

Here are my personal pros and cons of the game, but I'll start with cons, so as to end on a high note:

Cons: 

- Not many people play anymore 
-Mods are limited
-Short campaign
-Too expensive when not on sale
-Singleplayer AI is ironically uniteliigent sometimes

Pros:

-I CAN SEE MY LEGS!!!
-Amazing sounds (soundtrack, sound effects, music, etc.)
-Graphics are good for the time
-I CAN SEE MY LEGS!!!
-Truly well done zombies (I like when they look like they have a hangover when they're not running after you)
-Nice game mechanics
-I CAN SEE MY LEGS!!!
-Cool props 
-Visuals are nice
-No stupid invisible barriers on objects such as desks and barriers (invisible barriers disallowing you to jump on objects)
